item.title: :bulb: shurp2018
item.description: What is it about? Some of my recent work includes writing the shurp2018-package. This R package contains all the functions used to produce descriptive reports for a study called SHURP2018 - a research project at the Institute of Nursing Science. More information is found here: https://shurp.unibas.ch more information will follow

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Catherine Blatter and I am a registered general nurse (RN) located in Switzerland. üè• My clinical interests and expertise lie primarily in adult acute-care surgical nursing, more specifically general, thoracic and neurosurgery in a tertiary center üë¥ üëµ I also enjoyed working in a more rural regional hospital with mostly older & chronically ill patients - in particular because (in my very own experience) patients and families have been more involved in any decision making and ‚Äúchoosing wisely‚Äù was very popular.

item.title: Useful hints for Endnote
item.description: üí° A collection of hints for working with Endnote this is a working document primarily addressed at students from the Institute of Nursing Science at University of Basel and may change over time - feedback welcome Q: Endnote does not find/download articles with full-text search? A: First, have you a installed a functioning licences version of Endnote? Check in your asknet [dot] unibas [dot] ch-account. Second, probably you need to install the connection, for instance the Wiley Online Library - instruction are posted here: https://endnote.
